function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited access to affordable and adequate housing","Impact":"Increased risk of crowded living conditions and heightened risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementation of affordable housing policies and social support programs","Technologies":"Urban planning tools for equitable housing distribution","People":"Population in need of affordable housing","Owner":"Government and housing authorities"},{"Description":"Inability of households to pay bills due to the pandemic","Impact":"Risk of homelessness and heightened financial stress leading to health issues","Mitigation":"Financial relief programs and assistance with bill payment","Technologies":"Digital payment platforms for efficient bill management","People":"Households experiencing financial hardship","Owner":"Government, financial institutions, and utility providers"},{"Description":"Amplified housing insecurity due to the crisis","Impact":"Increased mental and physical health issues, including stress, anxiety, and susceptibility to diseases","Mitigation":"Access to mental health support, community outreach programs, and housing assistance programs","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms for remote mental health services","People":"Individuals and families facing housing insecurity","Owner":"Healthcare providers, social services, and community organizations"}]}
